mapper.select: SELECT pn, email, name, dept, con, pos, state FROM user WHERE NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{inputName},'%') ORDER BY NAME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(email, name, dept, con, pos, state) VALUES (#{email},#{name},#{dept},#{con},#{pos},#{state})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET email=#{email}, name=#{name}, dept=#{dept}, con=#{con}, pos=#{pos}, state=#{state} where pn=#{pn}
